00001 /*
00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              DEGRADE
00004  *              sample-rate and bit-depth reduction 
00005  *******************************************************
00006  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00007  *              copyright © 2003 by Timothy A. Place
00008  *
00009  */
00010 
00011 // Check against redundant including
00012 #ifndef TT_DEGRADE_H
00013 #define TT_DEGRADE_H
00014 
00015 // Include appropriate headers
00016 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 #define BIG_INT 0x00800000
00026 #define ONE_OVER_BIG_INT 1.1920928955E-7
00027 
00028 class tt_degrade:public tt_audio_base{
00029 
00030         private:
00031                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     bitdepth;
00032                 tt_attribute_value                              sr_ratio;
00033                 short                                                   bit_shift;
00034                 float                                                   accumulator;
00035                 tt_sample_value                                 output;
00036         
00037         public:
00038                 enum selectors{                                                         
00039                         k_bitdepth,                                                             // Attribute Selectors
00040                         k_sr_ratio
00041                 };
00042                 
00043 
00044                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00045                 tt_degrade()                                                            // Constructor          
00046                 {
00047                         set_attr(k_bitdepth, 24);
00048                         set_attr(k_sr_ratio, 1.0);
00049                         accumulator = 0.0;
00050                         output = 0.0;
00051                 }
00052 
00053                 ~tt_degrade()                                                           // Destructor
00054                 {
00055                         ;
00056                 }
00057 
00058 
00059                 // ATTRIBUTES
00060                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00061                 {
00062                         switch (sel){                   
00063                                 case k_bitdepth:
00064                                         bitdepth = clip(int(val), 1, 24);
00065                                         bit_shift = 24 - bitdepth;
00066                                         break;
00067                                 case k_sr_ratio:
00068                                         sr_ratio = val;
00069                                         break;
00070                         }
00071                 }
00072 
00073                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                    // Get Attributes
00074                 {
00075                         switch (sel){
00076                                 case k_bitdepth:
00077                                         return bitdepth;
00078                                 case k_sr_ratio:
00079                                         return sr_ratio;
00080                                 default:
00081                                         return 0.0;
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084                 
00085                 
00086                 // DSP LOOP
00087                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00088                 {
00089                         long l;
00090                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00091                         
00092                         while(temp_vs--){
00093                                 // SR Reduction
00094                                 accumulator += sr_ratio;
00095                                 if (accumulator >= 1.0){
00096                                         output = *in->vector++;
00097                                         accumulator -= 1.0;
00098                                 }
00099                                 
00100                                 // Bit Depth Reduction
00101                                 l = long(output * BIG_INT);                             // change float to long int
00102                                 l >>= bit_shift;                                                // shift away the least-significant bits
00103                                 l <<= bit_shift;                                                // shift back to the correct registers
00104                                 *out->vector++ = (float) l * ONE_OVER_BIG_INT;  // back to float
00105                         }
00106                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00107                 }
00108 
00109 };
00110 
00111 
00112 #endif  // tt_DEGRADE_H
